argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lhpset.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lhpset.u | |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) |
| 3 |  | lhpset.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 4 |  | lhpset.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_islhp | |- ( K e. A -> ( W e. H <-> ( W e. B /\ W C .1. ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_baibd | |- ( ( K e. A /\ W e. B ) -> ( W e. H <-> W C .1. ) ) |
